item.description:
I'm going to be there at 5:00pm. I uploaded the pfd image in 'Files' of the advance screening movie The pink Panther 2.

Please be there at 5:50pm or come early and you will win to see a good movie.
I'll be in line to wait for a few members can come over and take my spot and I'll will wait for more members near the tables. There might be a huge line so don't hesitate to call or feel intimidated to call me. I'm there to escort you and the others to where the others are holding a line for us.




The Pink Panther 2 - Trailer


Add my name and number now 617-435-8177 Windsor


The first few can start a line for us and the last of us can head up and meet them where ever there are in line.





Cheers!
item.how_to_find_us: Call my cellphone number once your on the escalators going up
item.name: The Pink Panther 2 - Advance Screening Movie - (updated info)
